attributes.action: Banned an online game called Muslim Massacre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would just like to say that i do not agree how a game like this can make the average internet user be interested in. If a teenager was on this game for 6 solid hours, what action would be there be next for that individual? Will he go re-inact the game he has just played, in a time when the world is trying to bring peace, a stupid game has been released to cause more tension for when its not really due, it appauls me that God (Allah) is a target in the game. This cannot be tolerated and the muslims will do anything they can to stop this from ever being played. Absolutley pathetic.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
